results.name: Take every third term of the {0,1}-version of the Thue-Morse sequence: a(n) = A010060(3n).
reference: Cobham, A., Uniform tag sequences, Math. Systems Theory (1972) 6: 164-192. https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01706087. See Example 9.
Hofer, Roswitha. "Coquet-type formulas for the rarefied weighted Thue-Morse sequence." Discrete Mathematics 311.16 (2011): 1724-1734.
